$Id: condition.xml 363 2007-02-12 16:42:15Z shirea $
This adaptor does the following...
* reads all data in sample_json_object.txt * converts the text it to a JSONObject * converts the JSON to an OrderedMap * converts the OrderedMap to XML * outputs to stdout
It is designed to illustrate a simple use of a JSONToOrderedMapConvertor
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringApplication -config fromjson.xml -bean Adaptor
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
writes to stdout
